articles.title: Rosalind Franklin Mars Rover Passes Latest Tests Ahead of September Launch - I-Connect007
articles.description: The European Space Agency (ESA) rover starts the year with months of successful maintenance and functional tests behind it. All its instruments are go for flight, with some minor tuning left to complete this month.
